subtitles.original: Can’t escape the scrolling, it takes a toll of me
subtitles.english: Can’t escape the scrolling, it takes a toll of me

subtitles.original: Dead and lost still looping, holding me
subtitles.english: Dead and lost still looping, holding me

subtitles.english: Sorry I could never be the god I was sought to be

subtitles.english: So to speak, annihilate fools gold

subtitles.english: Living out the role I was told to be

subtitles.original: I’ll be old and free in a matter of centuries
subtitles.english: I’ll be old and free in a matter of centuries

subtitles.original: Wondered if there was a point to me
subtitles.english: Wondered if there was a point to me

subtitles.original: Was thinking for sure I’d belong on my own
subtitles.english: Was thinking for sure I’d belong on my own

subtitles.english: But I found a place to belong

subtitles.english: Melting together, just running and attracting each other

subtitles.original: Hello, Hello, 今宵のEnsomnia
subtitles.english: Hello, Hello, tonight's Ensomnia

subtitles.english: Let's maintain

subtitles.original: In a world where nothing is certain
subtitles.english: In a world where nothing is certain

subtitles.english: Except that someday we will say goodbye

subtitles.original: I want to keep my eyes on the sky
subtitles.english: I want to keep my eyes on the sky

subtitles.english: This desert-like city is a Disaster!

subtitles.english: Sugoroku, the mercy of the accelerating future

subtitles.english: Not a no, to the reunion I want to believe in

subtitles.original: 焦げ付くほどの　Hold you all day long
subtitles.english: Burning so hot, I'll hold you all day long

subtitles.english: Hello, Hello, tonight's Daydreamer

subtitles.original: Let's maintain!
subtitles.english: Let's maintain!

subtitles.original: SHOUT! We're changing the game
subtitles.english: SHOUT! We're changing the game

subtitles.original: Masquerading the chains, what gives you the say?
subtitles.english: Masquerading the chains, what gives you the say?

subtitles.original: S-O-S THE FIRE!
subtitles.english: S-O-S THE FIRE!

subtitles.original: SHOUT! We're changing the game
subtitles.english: SHOUT! We're changing the game

subtitles.original: Masquerading the chains, what gives you the say?
subtitles.english: Masquerading the chains, what gives you the say?

subtitles.original: S-O-S THE FIRE!
subtitles.english: S-O-S THE FIRE!

subtitles.original: Hey, yeah, hey, hey, everyone! Whoo!
subtitles.english: Hey, yeah, hey, hey, everyone! Whoo!

subtitles.original: How was that? Tenshu and Mercy.
subtitles.english: How was that? Tenshu and Mercy.

subtitles.original: You know, writing that song reminded me, yes, I still can write songs...
subtitles.english: You know, writing that song reminded me, yes, I still can write songs...

subtitles.original: ...that are extremely difficult to perform live. Let's go!
subtitles.english: ...that are extremely difficult to perform live. Let's go!

subtitles.original: Some things never change, it feels.
subtitles.english: Some things never change, it feels.

subtitles.original: But hey, how about the tech for this concert?
subtitles.english: But hey, how about the tech for this concert?

subtitles.original: Hold on, are you guys seeing this Sakura behind me? Like, the detail?
subtitles.english: Hold on, are you guys seeing this Sakura behind me? Like, the detail?

subtitles.original: Oh, hold on. Sorry.
subtitles.english: Oh, hold on. Sorry.

subtitles.original: Again, the Sakura tree is very powerful.
subtitles.english: Again, the Sakura tree is very powerful.

subtitles.original: It's such a big item and so detailed.
subtitles.english: It's such a big item and so detailed.

subtitles.original: Sometimes I stop moving.
subtitles.english: Sometimes I stop moving.

subtitles.original: That's okay, doesn't matter. Whoo!
subtitles.english: That's okay, doesn't matter. Whoo!

subtitles.original: パチパチパチ！
subtitles.english: Batchi batchi batchi!

subtitles.original: That was a thousand out of ten. Nailed it. Let's go!
subtitles.english: That was a thousand out of ten. Nailed it. Let's go!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: It is clean. Drink water.
subtitles.english: It is clean. Drink water.

subtitles.original: That's a really good idea.
subtitles.english: That's a really good idea.

subtitles.original: 水、水、水。
subtitles.english: Water, water, water.

subtitles.original: 水、水、水。
subtitles.english: Water, water, water.

subtitles.original: The invisible water.
subtitles.english: The invisible water.

subtitles.original: But I mean, if you guys think back to Phantomime...
subtitles.english: But I mean, if you guys think back to Phantomime...

subtitles.original: I see a lot of you guys talking about, like, "Oh, the production, the quality is so crazy!"
subtitles.english: I see a lot of you guys talking about, like, "Oh, the production, the quality is so crazy!"

subtitles.original: It's very powerful stuff going on around here...
subtitles.english: It's very powerful stuff going on around here...

subtitles.original: ...and they really knocked it out of the park with this.
subtitles.english: ...and they really knocked it out of the park with this.

subtitles.original: I just have so much thanks to give to my staff.
subtitles.english: I just have so much thanks to give to my staff.

subtitles.original: Um, be sure, we have a little credit roll at the end that will play...
subtitles.english: Um, be sure, we have a little credit roll at the end that will play...

subtitles.original: ...and, you know, that's my staff and big ups to them.
subtitles.english: ...and, you know, that's my staff and big ups to them.

subtitles.original: But remember the Phantomime concert, you guys...
subtitles.english: But remember the Phantomime concert, you guys...

subtitles.original: ...that we did, the little mini live for the release of Phantomime, which was really cool?
subtitles.english: ...that we did, the little mini live for the release of Phantomime, which was really cool?

subtitles.original: That already had like the echoes of the beginning of even better quality for these shows, right?
subtitles.english: That already had like the echoes of the beginning of even better quality for these shows, right?

subtitles.original: Well, can you imagine what the next is gonna look like?
subtitles.english: Well, can you imagine what the next is gonna look like?

subtitles.original: I mean, if this, if this looks like this right now...
subtitles.english: I mean, if this, if this looks like this right now...

subtitles.original: I mean, can you imagine where we go from here?
subtitles.english: I mean, can you imagine where we go from here?

subtitles.original: I mean, it's just really exciting to think about.
subtitles.english: I mean, it's just really exciting to think about.

subtitles.original: 20 years from now, Dead Beats, 20 years from now, who knows?
subtitles.english: 20 years from now, Dead Beats, 20 years from now, who knows?

subtitles.original: I probably will be as detailed as that Sakura tree...
subtitles.english: I probably will be as detailed as that Sakura tree...

subtitles.original: ...but don't worry, it won't be too much, it'll still feel like me.
subtitles.english: ...but don't worry, it won't be too much, it'll still feel like me.

subtitles.original: I'll make sure about that.
subtitles.english: I'll make sure about that.

subtitles.original: This is already kind of toeing the line, I think...
subtitles.english: This is already kind of toeing the line, I think...

subtitles.original: ...but I'd love to, like, move my face a little bit more and stuff like that.
subtitles.english: ...but I'd love to, like, move my face a little bit more and stuff like that.

subtitles.original: It would be more dramatic if leaves were scattering around?
subtitles.english: It would be more dramatic if leaves were scattering around?

subtitles.original: That's a good point.
subtitles.english: That's a good point.

subtitles.original: However, Dead Beat, you say that, if Sakura was falling right now...
subtitles.english: However, Dead Beat, you say that, if Sakura was falling right now...

subtitles.original: ...I think that every PC in this studio would catch on fire.
subtitles.english: ...I think that every PC in this studio would catch on fire.

subtitles.original: Great idea though.
subtitles.english: Great idea though.

subtitles.original: 自撮りタイム！
subtitles.english: Selfie time!

subtitles.original: Okay, here we go.
subtitles.english: Okay, here we go.

subtitles.original: Now I'm using this camera again.
subtitles.english: Now I'm using this camera again.

subtitles.original: Whoa, okay.
subtitles.english: Whoa, okay.

subtitles.original: You guys can get... I'm backing up, I'm backing up.
subtitles.english: You guys can get... I'm backing up, I'm backing up.

subtitles.original: A bit of a closer look...
subtitles.english: A bit of a closer look...

subtitles.original: ...that Sakura tree behind, that is 3D.
subtitles.english: ...that Sakura tree behind, that is 3D.

subtitles.original: They're laughing, they're laughing.
subtitles.english: They're laughing, they're laughing.

subtitles.original: You're laughing at me! Stop it!
subtitles.english: You're laughing at me! Stop it!

subtitles.original: Stop!
subtitles.english: Stop!

subtitles.original: Someday I'll be able to make an angry face at you, so get ready for that.
subtitles.english: Someday I'll be able to make an angry face at you, so get ready for that.

subtitles.original: That's another thing to look forward to, Dead Beats. Bye!
subtitles.english: That's another thing to look forward to, Dead Beats. Bye!
